metadata.name: Stand on the white sword
metadata.description:
Stand on the white sword 

This photograph was taken in Tamilnadu, in the town of Tuticorin, in the southern region of India.

One of the hardest jobs with the lowest pay is this one.

Due to the significant rain flow during the monsoon season, these workers experience more hardships, and in order to safeguard their way of life, they migrate to western regions.

//  
Artist : satzhema

Collection: Taste of life 

Edition: Limited to 15

License: Primary NFT holder is free use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by the holder of the NFT, as long as the creator is credited.
